mapper.insert: insert into TF_SM_OUTORDER_RESULT_LOG t (T.TRADE_ID, T.EPARCHY_CODE, T.CHANNEL_CODE, T.NET_TYPE_CODE, T.SERIAL_NUMBER, T.NOTIFY_TYPE, T.ACT_ID, T.ACT_NAME, T.USER_ACT_START_TIME, T.USER_ACT_END_TIME, T.ORGANIZER, T.RES_ID, T.RES_NAME, T.UNSUBSCRIBE_TYPE, T.ORDER_TIME, T.CREATE_TIME) values( #{tradeId}, #{eparchyCode}, #{channelCode}, #{netTypeCode}, #{serialNumber}, #{notifyType}, #{actId}, #{actName}, #{userActStartTime}, #{userActEndTime}, #{organizer}, #{resId}, #{resName}, #{unsubscribeType}, #{orderTime}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: select t.TRADE_ID from TF_SM_OUTORDER_RESULT_LOG t where t.TRADE_ID=#{tradeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into TF_SM_OUTORDER_RESULT_ERR_LOG t (T.TRADE_ID, T.EPARCHY_CODE, T.CHANNEL_CODE, T.NET_TYPE_CODE, T.SERIAL_NUMBER, T.NOTIFY_TYPE, T.ACT_ID, T.ACT_NAME, T.USER_ACT_START_TIME, T.USER_ACT_END_TIME, T.ORGANIZER, T.RES_ID, T.RES_NAME, T.UNSUBSCRIBE_TYPE, T.ORDER_TIME, T.CREATE_TIME, T.SOURCE_SYSID, T.ERR_CODE) values( #{tradeId}, #{eparchyCode}, #{channelCode}, #{netTypeCode}, #{serialNumber}, #{notifyType}, #{actId}, #{actName}, #{userActStartTime}, #{userActEndTime}, #{organizer}, #{resId}, #{resName}, #{unsubscribeType}, #{orderTime}, SYSDATE, '001', #{errCode} )
mapper.update: update tf_sm_periphery_user_action t set t.demand_end_date = sysdate where t.serial_number = #{serialNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.object_id in (select a.object_id from TD_HUABEI_OBJECT_MSG a)
